QuestData.Title: The Amulet of Sevine
QuestData.Description: The second amulet, Sevine's amulet, is in the hands of a murloc, far to the south, on a shelf that overlooks the Shattershore. How it ended up in that murloc's possession, I cannot say, but I can state with certainty that you will find it there.$b$bBring her amulet to me, along with the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Amulet of Sevine from Salt-Flop near the Shattershore in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Sevine's amulet... along with the others, we can summon the Defiler.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kasim hefts the amulet.>$b$bA warlock... and a powerful one at that. I will hold onto this until the time is right.
